input.sentences: had a little get together with some friends today .
just hanging out and having good food and even better company .
the guests just kept pouring in .
the wife made this beautiful setup to keep us lighted at night .
ca n't forget the campfire ! nice cozy day .
output.sentences: They sat in the courtyard, pondering the events for the evening as they waited for their guests to arrive.
Shortly after arriving, cliques began to form among the attendees to the friendly get together.
Suddenly, some uninvited guests arrived outside, but the ever hospitable hosts allowed them to join the fun.
Soon, everyone had partaken of the signature spiked punch and was mildly hallucinating at the lights strewn about the patio.
Thankfully, no one was injured by falling into the fire that night.
